commands.name: az network private-dns record-set a add-record
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set a add-record --ipv4-address
                                               --record-set-name
                                               --resource-group
                                               --zone-name
examples:
az network private-dns record-set a add-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -a MyIpv4Address

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set a create
commands.summary: Create an empty A record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set a create --name
                                           --resource-group
                                           --zone-name
                                           [--metadata]
                                           [--ttl]
examples: az network private-dns record-set a create -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set a delete
commands.summary: Delete an A record set and all associated records.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set a delete [--ids]
                                           [--if-match]
                                           [--name]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--yes]
                                           [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set a delete -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com -n MyRecordSet

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set a list
commands.summary: List all A record sets in a zone.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set a list --resource-group
                                         --zone-name
                                         [--max-items]
                                         [--next-token]
examples: az network private-dns record-set a list -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set a remove-record
commands.summary: Remove an A record from its record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set a remove-record --ipv4-address
                                                  --record-set-name
                                                  --resource-group
                                                  --zone-name
                                                  [--keep-empty-record-set]
examples:
az network private-dns record-set a remove-record -g MyResourceGroup -z www.mysite.com \
    -n MyRecordSet -a MyIpv4Address

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set a show
commands.summary: Get the details of an A record set.
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set a show [--ids]
                                         [--name]
                                         [--resource-group]
                                         [--subscription]
                                         [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set a show -g MyResourceGroup -n MyRecordSet -z www.mysite.com

commands.name: az network private-dns record-set a update
commands.syntax:
az network private-dns record-set a update [--add]
                                           [--force-string {0, 1, f, false, n, no, t, true, y, yes}]
                                           [--ids]
                                           [--if-match]
                                           [--metadata]
                                           [--name]
                                           [--remove]
                                           [--resource-group]
                                           [--set]
                                           [--subscription]
                                           [--zone-name]
examples: az network private-dns record-set a update -g MyResourceGroup -n MyRecordSet -z www.mysite.com --metadata owner=WebTeam
